name: Pran Orange Jelly
description:
This jelly is made from high-quality ingredients, including real orange juice, sugar, and gelatin, which gives it a smooth and jiggly texture. Pran Orange Jelly is free from artificial colors, flavors, and preservatives, ensuring that you're consuming a natural and healthy product. It is a great snack for kids and adults alike and can be enjoyed on it's own or as a topping for ice cream or cake. Pran Orange Jelly is a versatile dessert that is perfect for any occasion, whether you're hosting a party or enjoying a quiet evening at home.

name: Kishwan Orange Jelly
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from India. Kishwan Orange Jelly is a sweet and fruity delight that captures the luscious and tangy flavor of ripe oranges in a convenient jelly form. This 500 gm jar of orange jelly is a versatile and flavorful treat that can be enjoyed in various ways, whether as a standalone dessert, a topping, or a versatile ingredient in your culinary creations.

description:

name: Kishwan Diabetic Orange Jelly
description:
Kishwan Diabetic Orange Jelly is a thoughtfully crafted and sugar-free delight designed to provide a sweet and fruity experience for those who need to manage their sugar intake. This 500 gm jar of diabetic-friendly orange jelly offers the luscious and tangy flavor of ripe oranges without the added sugars, making it a delicious and guilt-free treat.

name: Ruchi Mixed Fruit Jam
description:
Ruchi Mixed Fruit Jam is a delightful combination of various fruits blended into a smooth and flavorful spread, perfect for adding a burst of fruity sweetness to your meals and snacks. Ingredients:Mixed Fruit Pulp (Mango, Pineapple, Apple, and Papaya)SugarGlucose SyrupCitric Acid (Acidity Regulator)Fruit Pectin (Thickener)Permitted Food Colors and Flavors Uses:Breakfast Spread: Perfect for spreading on bread, toast, or pancakes.Dessert Ingredient: Use in cakes, pastries, or cookies for a fruity twist.Snack Companion: Pair with crackers or as a dip for fruits.Smoothies and Shakes: Add a spoonful for enhanced flavor. Benefits:Energy Boost: A quick source of energy due to its natural fruit sugars.Rich in Flavors: Contains the goodness and taste of multiple fruits in one jar.Kid-Friendly: Loved by kids as a tasty addition to their snacks. Brand: Ruchi Pack Size: 500 gm

name: Best's Mixed Fruit Jam Conserve
description:
Best's Mixed Fruit Jam Conserve is a delicious spread made from a combination of carefully selected fruits, including strawberries, raspberries, blackcurrants, and blackberries. It comes in a 450 gm jar and is perfect for adding a fruity burst of flavor to your toast, scones, or muffins.

name: Best's Orange Marmalade Jam Conserve
description:
Best's Orange Marmalade Jam Conserve is a delicious and flavorful spread made from fresh and juicy oranges. This jam is carefully crafted using traditional methods to ensure that the natural flavors of the oranges are preserved. Each 450 gm jar of Best's Orange Marmalade Jam Conserve contains a blend of tangy and sweet flavors that are perfect for spreading on toast, bagels, scones, or croissants.

name: ST-Dalfour Jam Four Fruits
description:
Experience the exquisite blend of nature's finest fruits with ST-Dalfour Jam Four Fruits. This 284-gram jar contains a harmonious mixture of succulent strawberries, ripe raspberries, tangy cherries, and sweet blackcurrants, expertly crafted into a premium fruit spread that captures the pure essence of orchard-fresh goodness. Whether you're spreading it on your morning toast, adding it to your dessert recipes, or simply enjoying it by the spoonful, this jam is a delightful embodiment of the fruits' natural flavors and an invitation to savor the goodness of nature. Elevate your culinary experiences with ST-Dalfour Jam Four Fruits and relish the harmonious blend of four extraordinary fruits in every bite.

name: Stute Apricot Conserve Extra Jam
description:
Indulge in the luscious taste of Stute Apricot Conserve Extra Jam, a 340-gram jar of pure fruity goodness that captures the essence of sun-ripened apricots in every spoonful. This exquisite conserve is a delightful addition to your breakfast table, afternoon tea, or culinary creations. Whether you're spreading it on your morning toast, adding a dollop to your yogurt, or incorporating it into your cooking and baking, this jam promises to deliver the irresistible flavor of sun-ripened apricots with every bite.

description:

Crafted with care, this strawberry jam is specially formulated to provide the classic taste of sweet and tangy strawberries while being suitable for individuals with diabetes or those looking to reduce their sugar intake. name: Stute Thick Cut Orange Marmalade Jam
description:
Stute Thick Cut Orange Marmalade is a premium marmalade made with high fruit content, offering a bold, zesty flavor. It uses whole fruit rather than pulp or puree, making it ideal for a refreshing start to the day​. Ingredients: Oranges, Sugar, Glucose-Fructose Syrup, Acidity Regulators: Citric Acid, Sodium CitratesGelling Agent: Pectin. Prepared with 35g of fruit per 100g and a sugar content of 67g per 100g, it contains no artificial colors, preservatives, or additives​. Use: This marmalade is versatile and perfect for Spreading on toast or bread Serving with cakes or scones Pairing with tea for a classic British experience.
Stute Thick Cut Orange Marmalade is a premium marmalade made with high fruit content, offering a bold, zesty flavor. It uses whole fruit rather than pulp or puree, making it ideal for a refreshing start to the day​.
 
Ingredients: Oranges, Sugar, Glucose-Fructose Syrup, Acidity Regulators: Citric Acid, Sodium Citrates
Gelling Agent: Pectin. Prepared with 35g of fruit per 100g and a sugar content of 67g per 100g, it contains no artificial colors, preservatives, or additives​.
 
Use: This marmalade is versatile and perfect for Spreading on toast or bread Serving with cakes or scones Pairing with tea for a classic British experience.
